name: Fleche
overview:
39 darts to throw to score to the maximum. There are the traditional rules of the game in which you have to succeed in placing shots closer to the centre, but not only if you want to blow up the score. You must aim for smaller boxes too, ideally touching the centre of the target.

To bring a little spice to a game that would otherwise be too simple on computer, the hand holding the dart represented on the screen shakes, forcing you to anticipate your shots.
